articles.description: However, in his career, Akram was accused of match-fixing and he has often spoken about how certain people in Pakistan still believe him to be a match-fixer.
articles.content: Former Pakistan captain Wasim Akram is known as one of the finest pacers to ever play the game. He was famous for swinging the ball left, right and centre and once the ball started to reverse, the le… [+1788 chars]

articles.title: 17 Football Fans In Kerala Buy Rs 23 Lakh House To Watch World Cup Matches Together - NDTV
articles.description: Before buying the house, the group had established a unique tradition of watching football games together.
articles.content:
17 residents of Mundakkamugal village in Kochi brought a house for Rs 23 lakh
